transcript.text: hey guys I have literally five minutes
to do this
so I just wanted to do this quickly
about six months ago I was sent audio by

really wanted me to listen to it it was
the recordings of Montgomery that I just
shared with everybody that I recorded
six months ago six months ago when I did
this I spoke with him and we kind of
came to the conclusion that I was going
to give him credit for the information
in the description box of my video as
well as a producer credit which I did so
now that ivory released this again and
started talking about it again today Jed
is back and he is concerned that he's
not receiving the credit for sharing the
initial audio with me this being said
and given that I am never one to steal
someone's information and use it without
giving credit I figured that I would
make a video dedicated to specifically
thanking Jed Clampett who is a YouTube
user who has a channel and he has a few
videos who graciously six months ago or
so shared with me the blix f montgomery
audio which you can also find on
soundcloud and he's got a few other
videos and he really wants to be
recognized for sharing this information
he gave it to me I shared it it picked
up some traction I credit him for it at
the time we had some conversations about
it he said you know I you know it wasn't
necessarily very important to him but
when I shared it again today he showed
up in my comments and he wasn't happy so
I figured like I said I would share a
whole video just thanking Jed for his
good work and sharing the Montgomery
audio on his youtube channel so Thank
You Ted Thank You Jed Clampett Jed
Clampett can be found in the comment
section of my most recent Montgomery
release
so just wanted to throw that out there
Jed I never would have known about that
if it weren't for you and I'm not you
know trying to grab any glory I'm just
trying to share information so I just
wanted to make sure I spent a good five
minutes or so thanking you for your
contribution to the story that I just
did and hopefully now if I ever share

again this will kind of remain on my

hair is frizzy and there's nothing I can

Clampett Jed Clampett for sharing the
original Montgomery audio with me and
letting me hear that and then share it
with all of you guys and if it weren't
for Jed I would never have heard that
Montgomery audio so I think that about
sums up this video if you want to

you'll see very clearly he's upset about

so I figured I would do it this way
hopefully this is sufficient and
hopefully everybody knows who gave me
this information initially and how I got

Jed Clampett thank you I'm going on the
